data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bustamante, Abel A., Ruiz, Gustavo R. S. (2016): Three new species of Kalcerrytus Galiano, 2000 from Brazil (Araneae: Salticidae). Zootaxa 4066 (1): 41-51, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4066.1.2
